title: LawfulGoodScraperOutput
description: Schema for LLM to generate structured output for web scraping operations compliant with data protection regulations

metadata.description: Information about the scraping operation - LLM should populate with operation details

operationId.description: Unique identifier for the scraping operation (LLM should generate a UUID)

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the data was collected (LLM should use current time)

sourceUrl.description: URL of the scraped website (domain only, no query parameters)

sourceDomain.description: Domain name of the scraped website

legalBasis.description: GDPR legal basis for processing this data

retentionPeriod.description: How long the data will be retained (e.g., '30 days', '6 months')

processingPurpose.description: Specific purpose for collecting this data

complianceInfo.description: Information related to legal compliance - LLM should evaluate and populate based on context

robotsTxtChecked.description: Whether robots.txt was checked and respected

robotsTxtAllows.description: Whether robots.txt allows scraping of this content

termsChecked.description: Whether site terms of service were checked

personalDataPresent.description: Whether personal data is present in the scraped content

dataMinimized.description: Whether personal data has been minimized/redacted where possible

copyrightNotice.description: Copyright notice from the source if present

dpoPreviouslyNotified.description: Whether DPO has been previously notified about scraping this domain

scrapedData.description: The actual data extracted from the website

contentType.description: Type of content that was scraped

elementType.description: Type of the element (heading, paragraph, price, etc.)

data.description: The extracted data, anonymized if it contains personal information

containsPersonalData.description: Whether this element contained personal data

processingJustification.description: Specific justification for processing this element if it contains personal data

structuredData.description: Structured data extracted from the page (if available)

metaTags.description: Metadata from the page, excluding personal data

processingLog.description: Log of processing steps for auditability

automatedDecision.description: Whether this was an automated decision

riskLevel.description: Overall risk level of this scraping operation

llmOutputGuidance.description: Instructions for LLM when generating this output

responseFormat.description: Format the output as a complete, valid JSON object following this schema structure

personalDataHandling.description: Always redact or pseudonymize personal data with [REDACTED] marker and set containsPersonalData to true

complianceChecks.description: Always check for compliance attributes based on context and set values truthfully

metadataGeneration.description: Generate appropriate metadata including unique operationId and current timestamp

examples.description: Example of a valid structure (not to be included in LLM output)

metadata.processingPurpose: Market research on product pricing trends
